thread.title: Matt Damon’s feud with ‘talentless’ Jimmy Kimmel reignites on Oscars night as host calls him ‘fat’ and ‘bans him from getting up on stage’
thread.title_full: Matt Damon’s feud with ‘talentless’ Jimmy Kimmel reignites on Oscars night as host calls him ‘fat’ and ‘bans him from getting up on stage’

author: glittlejohn
title: Matt Damon’s feud with ‘talentless’ Jimmy Kimmel reignites on Oscars night as host calls him ‘fat’ and ‘bans him from getting up on stage’
text:
5 ... which was being conducted by Kimmel 
Earlier in the evening, Kimmel took to his Twitter page to post a photo of himself watching Damon arriving at last night’s awards and wrote: “Dead man walking the red carpet”, as Matt told his interviewer: “He’s talentless himself. Unfortunately, he’s got an incredible group of writers who work for him. So I’m afraid. I think I’m in for it tonight.” Matt Damon played off Oscars stage by Jimmy Kimmel in on going 'fued' 
And a few days ago he joked that he would do anything to stop him getting on the stage, referring to Damon crashing the stage during last September’s Emmy Awards which Kimmel was hosting to gloat over him losing the gong for Outstanding Variety Talk Series. RELATED STORIES Chrissy Teigan caught SLEEPING on husband John Legend's shoulder during Oscars ceremony WHERE'S EVA MENDES? Ryan Gosling's busty Oscars 2017 date revealed to be his sister, as she sends Twitter into meltdown DOUBLE TROUBLE Buxom Mariah Carey flashes her knickers and bursts out of dress at Vanity Fair Oscars bash AND THE BEST BLUNDER GOES TO... Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway WRONGLY name La La Land as Best Picture... before award is awkwardly handed over to REAL winners Moonlight 'WE DEEPLY REGRET IT' Oscars accountants PWC apologise for epic mistake after La La Land is wrongly named Best Picture HOLLYWOOD DUMPS ON TRUMP Academy Awards host Jimmy Kimmel slams Donald Trump as dozens of stars protest travel ban Meryl s-trip Awkward moment Meryl Streep trips on the red carpet hours after public spat with Karl Lagerfeld over gown THIGH'S THE LIMIT Jennifer Aniston leg-bombs at Oscars after-party... Just like Angelina Jolie’s memorable pose in 2012 IT'S ABOUT TIME Viola Davis receives standing ovation as she wins Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress 
Of course, the whole feud is all very tongue-in-cheek and all began in 2005 when Damon was appearing as a guest on Kimmel’s chat show ‘Jimmy Kimmel Live!’ – but when he took a seat neat to the host, Kimmel told him they had run out of time. Dead man walking the red carpet. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/j2KaUkdHTX 
— Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
And so the fun began, with Kimmel’s then-girlfriend Sarah Silverman teamed up with Damon to make the music video “I’m F***ing Matt Damon’, which was aired on Kimmel’s show and then went viral. 
In 2013, Damon hijacked Kimmel’s show, tied him up and hosted the programme himself and then a series of skits were aired which saw the pair participating in couples’ therapy.
